name: STARBORNE 64
description:
Starborne 64

- Game is WIP and there are bugs of which i know, im working on patch them as soon as possible!

- I personally recommend playing on a controller.

v1.0.3  notes:

- All sounds now work
- Fixed few bugs
- More balanced difficulty
- Added volumetric effects

v1.0.1 notes:

- Added menu midi music.
- Enemies no longer clip through wall.
- Added more ammo to pickup.

Known issues:

- When you die and start the game again, shaders will glitch out and some bugs will appear in the level, so its best to restart the whole game if you want to try again. I will fix this later.
- If you notice something please let me know.

1. System Requirements

----------------------------------------

Optimal Requirements: 

i7 2,60Ghz CPU or equivalent
Windows 8.1/10/11 or any Linux distro of your desire
8 GB RAM
OpenGL 4.3 compliant 3D accelerated video card with 4 GB VRAM
~500 MB uncompressed hard drive space 
Keyboard and Mouse or Controller

Note: 3D accelerated video card required. It may be necessary to update your hardware drivers before playing.

2. Instructions

----------------------------------------

Keyboard:

Use ARROW KEYS to walk around. Hold SHIFT to run. CTRL to shoot. R to reload. SPACE to open doors or hidden passages. Z & X to strafe left and right. C to jump. Q & A to look up and down.

Mouse:

MOVE mouse to walk around. LEFT BUTTON to shoot. MIDDLE MOUSE BUTTON to open doors or hidden passages. RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to reload. Hold RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to strafe. Scroll MOUSE WHEEL to look up and down.

Controller:

Use D-PAD to walk around. Hold X to run. B to shoot. Y to reload. A to jump. RIGHT SHOULDER to open doors or hidden passages. LEFT SHOULDER + D-UP & D-DOWN to look up and down. LEFT & RIGHT TRIGGER to strafe.

3. Troubleshooting

----------------------------------------

- If the game is not running smoothly, try forcing it to run on your Dedicated GPU.

- If the game is crashing on loading screen, try running it again, it will probably happen only once.
